name: PocoLoco!
description:
SERVE

Help Poco serve up her orders, and get lots of gold! Try not to keep too many customers waiting or they'll leave upset!

WASD to move, 
E to pick up ingredients/throw away ingredients at the bin
F to cook, and G to serve at the counter!

NOTE: If you can't pick up the ingredients, try restarting the game.

The game may sometimes freeze. Just refresh the page. We couldn't fix it in time lol @DY pls help :')

v tight deadline for this phase of the build, but we would like to keep working on it to make it better!!

Made by: Jae and Cherie

Credits:

Font: Rainyhearts by Camellina on dafont
BGM: Medieval: Ministrel Dance by RandomMind on Chosic
